Carrie Wittmer
“Like Janeane Garofalo, but real.”
Apr 14

The Essential Guide to Appropriating Other Cultures at Coachella

When you love Lorde, but you’ve also been to Southeast Asia.

Coachella is upon us, which means that we can expect some killer florals, John Lennon circle sunnies, and some serious sartorial appropriation of cultures from around the world.

Bey may have canceled (#Beybies) but that doesn’t mean you can’t get in #Formation with 19 other girls named Lynsday! Coachella is the best place for every FASHUN GRL to appropriate her most favorite culture!

From the Asians to the Aziz Ansaris, here’s a look at all the best FASHUN to wear at Coachella if you’re a FASHUN GRL who is constantly inspired by other CULTURES that you learn about from other white people.

Kimonos!

Nothing says “I’ve seen Mulan even though I wasn’t born until three months after it came out so I TOTALLY ~*respect*~ Japanese culture or Korean culture or whatever” like a fresh kimono from Forever 21! It will keep you cool when you’re covering your vagina when you’re having sex on the lawn with a guy who says he’s James Franco during the Warpaint set (sooooo good, right?) Bonus points if it’s got a dragon on it.

Bindi

Do you believe in astrology AND psychology AND that the Earth is flat AND that Girl Talk is real music? Ummm, a bindi is, like, PERFECT for you.

A chief hat

Savages! Savages! Barely even human! Haha, that is such an old song. Indians were people though, and thank GODDESS they invented these great feather hats to match the tattoo on your forearm!

A sexi sari

You won’t be saying “Aziz I’m sari for wearing this” when you’re looking back at the Facebook photos from this great weekend when you’re in your 40s, promise! Pair it with a floppy hat, and you’ll look like you’ll look like a mermaid who has traveled

Dashiki + Cornrows

Every FASHUN GRL knows that a Dashiki makes a perfect mini dress. And it’s made even better with some cornrows. No nonsense, no frills, just feel good African vibes, grinding away to the sick beats of Radiohead’s A Moon Shaped Pool. Bonus points if you can get that girl you used to play basketball with to come and do the cornrows for you. She was the only black girl in the whole town, and you told her you were wide open all the time!

Flower crown

Who better to appropriate at a music festival for white people, than white people themselves?!!! There is literally nothing that tells the world “KENDRICK LAMAR IS SERIOUSLY MY F A V O R I T E” quite like a flower crown.

A diaper

You’re a wittle baby, and you wove mewzick! Diapers are sexy, and will protect you from the desert sun and when all your molly farts turn into liquid poop. Don’t forget to wear barely there pasties to match!

A flannel

Flower crowns aren’t the only piece from white culture begging to be appropriated! No, sir-ee! Channel your inner West Virginia coal miner on a Saturday in a soft, plaid flannel blouse, tied around the waist but so loosely that it keeps falling down your legs.

Calvin Klein underwear

It’s clothes now!!!!!

Carrie Wittmer went to music festival one time and cried in a Port-a-Potty after a teenager looked at her and said, “you have to be like SO OLD to drink alcohol.” Follow her on Twitter , Medium, and Instagram @carriesnotscary.
